name: Reksio i Kretes: Tajemnica Trzeciego Wymiaru
summary: A mysterious buzz in the middle of the night puts Reksio, Kretes and the Inventor Rooster on their feet. The friends, regardless of the danger, set out on a scouting journey. Soon it turns out that a powerful Black Monolith has grown in the clearing in the forest. Kretes touches its surface and at once all three heroes are drawn into the depths of the third dimension.
